mainClass.summary:

absoluteDifference.summary: The absolute value of the difference between one s value and another s value.

compareTo.summary: Compares the current instance with another object of the same type and returns an integer that indicates whether the current instance precedes, follows, or occurs in the same position in the sort order as the other object.
compareTo.param: An object to compare with this instance.
compareTo.returns:
A value that indicates the relative order of the objects being compared. The return value has these meanings:
Less than zero: This instance precedes in the sort order.
Zero: This instance occurs in the same position in the sort order as .
Greater than zero: This instance follows in the sort order.

equals.returns: if the specified is equal to this instance; otherwise, .

getAll.summary: Get all members of an type or sub-type.

getHashCode.summary: Returns a hash code for this instance.
getHashCode.returns: A hash code for this instance, suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures like a hash table.

new.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
